unnormalised: Forget sifting through outdated info and sketchy websites. These portals, like the 'Vidya Dhan' initiative and others popping up in metros like Mumbai and Chennai, are aggregating scholarships from various sources - government, private trusts, even your local NGOs. They help you filter by course, location (even specific colleges like IIT Delhi!), and even your caste.
